articles.content: News"It's something our board will consider at its next meeting in March," says CEO Geoff Allardice, as Afghanistan remain only Full Member without a women's team

articles.title: Tickets for Ind vs NZ ODI match in Hyderabad to be sold online - Telangana Today
articles.description: Speaking to media on Wednesday, the former Indian captain said that they will not sell the tickets off-line and fans can buy tickets on Paytm.

articles.title: "Maybe Time To Prepare For Life Without Jasprit Bumrah": Ex-India Cricketer Issues Big Warning - NDTV Sports
articles.description: Former India cricketer Aakash Chopra feels it's time for the Indian team to prepare for life without Jasprit Bumrah. Chopra's comments came after the pacer was ruled out the 3-match ODI series against Sri Lanka.
